title: PICK UP and LAY DOWN (PULD) CAST INSTRUCTIONS

orderedlist.listitem: The cast consists of a single back cast and a single forward cast, beginning and ending with the line on the water. Â It is the starting point for learning all overhead casts.
Instructor states purposes of the PULD cast.
The purpose of the cast is to teach rod loading and unloading, the pause length between back cast and forward cast, and how to control the size of the loops.
In fishing this cast achieves greater accuracy than the roll cast and allows the quick and efficient repositioning of the fly on the water.
